forces.name: Patrol Detachment 0CP
publications: Psychic Awakening VIII: War of the Spider
Psychic Awakening IV: Ritual of the Damned
Psychic Awakening VI: Saga of the Beast
Imperial Armour - Index: Forces of the Astra Militarum
Imperial Armour - Index: Forces of the Adeptus Astartes
Psychic Awakening II: Faith and Fury
Psychic Awakening III: Blood of Baal
Psychic Awakening V: The Greater Good

rules.name: Plague Weapon
rules.description: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for a weapon with this ability.

rules.name: Inexorable Advance
rules.description: If your Army is Battle-forged, all INFANTRY and HELBRUTE units in DEATH GUARD Detachments gain this ability. Such units do not suffer a penalty for moving and firing Heavy Weapons, or for Advancing and firing Assault weapons. In addition, a unit with this ability can fire twice with Rapid Fire weapons at a range of 18", instead of only being able to fire twice with them up to half the weapon's maximum range.

rules.name: Plague Host
rules.description: If your army is Battle-forged, all Troops units in DEATH GUARD Detachments gain this ability. Such a unit that is within range of an objective marker (as specified in the mission) controls that objective marker even if there are more enemy models within range of it. If an enemy unit within range of the same objective marker has a similar ability, then the objective marker is controlled by the player who has the most models within range as normal.

rules.name: Malicious Volleys
rules.description:
All DEATH GUARD units in Codex: Death Guard (excluding CHAOS CULTISTS units and POXWALKERS units) gain this ability:

Instead of following the normal rules for Rapid Fire weapons, Rapid Fire bolt weapons used by models in a unit with this ability make double the number of attacks if any of the following apply:
• The firing model’s target is within half the weapon’s maximum range.
• The firing model belongs to an INFANTRY unit and every model from that unit remained stationary in your
previous Movement phase.
• The firing model is a TERMINATOR , BIKER or HELBRUTE.

For the purposes of this ability, a Rapid Fire bolt weapon is any weapon with the Rapid Fire type whose profile includes the word ‘bolt’ (e.g. boltgun, combi-bolter, etc.)

rules.name: Daemonic Ritual
rules.description:
Instead of moving in their Movement phase, any DEATH GUARD CHARACTER can, at the end of their Movement phase, attempt to summon a NURGLE DAEMON unit with this ability by performing a Daemonic Ritual (the character cannot do so if they arrived as reinforcements this turn).

Roll up to 3 dice - this is your summoning roll. You can summon one new NURGLE DAEMON unit with the Daemonic Ritual ability to the battlefield that has a Power Rating equal to or less than the total result. This unit is treated as reinforcements for your army and can be placed anywhere on the battlefield that is entirely within 12" of the character and is more than 9" from any enemy model. If the total rolled is insufficient to summon any unit, the ritual fails and no new unit is summoned.

If your summoning roll included any doubles, your character then suffers a mortal wound. If it contained any triples, it instead suffers D3 mortal wounds.

rules.name: Hateful Assault
rules.description: If this unit makes a charge move, is charged or performs a Heroic Intervention, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of models in this unit until the end of the turn.

profiles.name: Typhus
profiles.powersKnown: Smite and 2 powers from the Contagion discipline

profiles.name: Host of the Destroyer Hive
profiles.description: Friendly units of Poxwalkers increase their Strength and Toughness by 1 whilst they are within 7" of Typhus.

profiles.name: Death to the False Emperor
profiles.description: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

profiles.name: Teleport Strike
profiles.description: During deployment, you can set up this model in a teleportarium chamber instead of placing it on the battlefield. At the end of any of your Movement phases the model can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Cataphractii Armour
profiles.description: Models in this unit have a 4+ invulnerable save, but you must halve the result of the dice rolled when determining how far this unit Advances.

profiles.name: Nurgle's Gift
profiles.description: All DEATH GUARD units within 7" of a friendly LORD OF CONTAGION are surrounded by a deadly aura of plague and disease. Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of any affected friendly units at the start of your turn; on a 4+ that enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

profiles.name: The Destroyer Hive
profiles.abilities: This weapon hits on hit rolls of 5+ (even when firing Overwatch), regardless of any modifiers.

profiles.name: Smite
profiles.details: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

profiles.name: Curse of the Walking Pox
profiles.description: Each time an enemy INFANTRY model is slain by a Poxwalker in the Fight phase, add one model to the Poxwalker's unit.

profiles.name: Diseased Horde
profiles.description: You can add 1 to all hit rolls for this unit in the Fight phase if it contains more than 10 models.

profiles.name: Mindless
profiles.description: This unit never has to take Morale tests.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

rules.name: Hateful Assault
rules.description: If this unit makes a charge move, is charged or performs a Heroic Intervention, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of models in this unit until the end of the turn.

These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

At the end of any of your Movement phases the model can use a teleport strike to arrive on the battlefield - set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" away from any enemy models.

profiles.name: Nurgle's Gift
profiles.description: All DEATH GUARD units within 7" of a friendly LORD OF CONTAGION are surrounded by a deadly aura of plague and disease. Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of any affected friendly units at the start of your turn; on a 4+ that enemy unit suffers a mortal wound.

profiles.name: Arch-Contaminator
profiles.description: Re-roll all failed wound rolls when resolving attacks made with a plague weapon (i.e. a plaguesword or any weapon with the Plague Weapon ability) for any friendly DEATH GUARD unit within 7" of your Warlord.

profiles.name: The Suppurating Plate
profiles.description: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+. In addition, roll a dice each time this model passes a saving throw in the Fight phase. On a 4+, the unit that inflicted that wound suffers a mortal wound after all of its own attacks have been resolved.

rules.name: Hateful Assault
rules.description: If this unit makes a charge move, is charged or performs a Heroic Intervention, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of models in this unit until the end of the turn.

profiles.name: Vectors of Death and Disease
profiles.description: A Plague Marine equipped with two plague knives, a plague knife and a bubotic axe, or a mace of contagion and bubotic axe, has an Attacks characteristic of 2 instead of 1.

profiles.name: Death to the False Emperor
profiles.description: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

profiles.description: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Lord of Resentment
profiles.description: Re-roll hit rolls of 1 made for friendly GELLERPOX INFECTED units within 6" of Vulgrar Thrice-Cursed.

profiles.name: Bionic Abomination
profiles.description: Vulgrar Thrice-Cursed has a 5+ invulnerable save.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Roll a D6 each time a model with this ability loses a wound; on a 5+ that model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Horrific Visage
profiles.description: Subtract 1 from the Leadership characteristic of units whilst they are within 6" of any enemy models with this ability.

profiles.name: Belly-flamer
profiles.abilities: This weapon automatically hits its target.

rules.name: Vulgrar's Followers
rules.description: This ability has no effect unless your army includes VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. If it does, you cannot set up any units with this ability before you have set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. When you set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED during deployment, all units with this ability are set up at the same time. When you set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED on the battlefield for the first time, all units with this ability must be set up within 6" of him. If they cannot be set up, they count as destroyed.

profiles.name: Gellercaust Mask
profiles.description: Models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save. Each time you roll an unmodified saving throw of 6 for this model in the Fight phase, the unit that made the attack suffers 1 mortal wound after it has made all of its attacks.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Roll a D6 each time a model with this ability loses a wound; on a 5+ that model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Daemonic
profiles.description: Models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

profiles.name: Squishable
profiles.description: Models in this unit only receive the benefit of their Disgustingly Resilient ability against attacks with a Damage characteristic of 1.

profiles.name: Weapons Glitch
profiles.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls made for attacks with ranged weapons that target this unit.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Roll a D6 each time a model with this ability loses a wound; on a 5+ that model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Diseased claws and fangs
profiles.abilities: Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for this weapon.

profiles.name: Leaping Insectoids
profiles.description: You can re-roll failed charge rolls for this unit. In addition, whenever this unit piles in or consolidates, it can move up to 6" instead of 3".

profiles.name: Mutoid Vermin
profiles.description: This unit does not take up a slot in a Detachment that includes Vulgrar Thrice-Cursed.

profiles.name: Bloodsucking proboscis
profiles.abilities: Each unmodified hit roll of 6 made for an attack with this weapon scores 2 hits.

rules.name: Vulgrar's Followers
rules.description: This ability has no effect unless your army includes VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. If it does, you cannot set up any units with this ability before you have set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. profiles.name: Buzzing Swarm
profiles.description: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

profiles.name: Hatchlings
profiles.description: Add 1 slain model to this unit at the start of every turn.

profiles.name: Mutoid Vermin
profiles.description: This unit does not take up a slot in a Detachment that includes Vulgrar Thrice-Cursed.

profiles.name: Spawning barb
profiles.abilities: Each unmodified hit roll of 6 made for this weapon automatically results in a wound (do not make a wound roll for that attack).

rules.name: Vulgrar's Followers
rules.description: This ability has no effect unless your army includes VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. If it does, you cannot set up any units with this ability before you have set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED. When you set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED during deployment, all units with this ability are set up at the same time. When you set up VULGRAR THRICE-CURSED on the battlefield for the first time, all units with this ability must be set up within 6" of him. If they cannot be set up, they count as destroyed.

profiles.name: Caustic Blood
profiles.description: Roll a D6 each time a model in this unit is slain in the Fight phase; on a 6 the unit that killed the model suffers a mortal wound after it has made all its attacks.

profiles.name: Mutoid Vermin
profiles.description: This unit does not take up a slot in a Detachment that includes Vulgrar Thrice-Cursed.

profiles.name: Explodes
profiles.description: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, roll a D6 before removing it from the battlefield. On a 5+ it explodes, and each unit within 6" suffers D3 mortal wounds.

profiles.name: Daemonic
profiles.description: This model has a 5+ invulnerable save.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

profiles.name: Plagueburst Mortar
profiles.abilities: Plague Weapon. This weapon can target units that are not visible to the bearer. Blast.

profiles.name: Plaguespitter
profiles.abilities: Plague Weapon.This weapon automatically hits its target.

rules.name: Hateful Assault
rules.description: If this unit makes a charge move, is charged or performs a Heroic Intervention, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of models in this unit until the end of the turn.

profiles.name: Unholy Death's Head
profiles.description: Each Foul Blightspawn carries a single unholy death's head grenade. Once per battle, a Foul Blightspawn, or another friendly DEATH GUARD CHARACTER within 3" of him, can throw an unholy death's head grenade instead of either a blight grenade or a hyper blight grenade. When they do so, change that weapon's type to Grenade 2D6.

profiles.name: Revolting Stench
profiles.description: Enemy units that charged this turn and are within 7" of this model at the start of the Fight phase are struck by a stench so foul that they falter, losing their impetus. Such a unit does not get to fight first in the Fight phase, but can be chosen to fight like other units that did not charge. This ability also affects units who have abilities that would enable them to fight first as if they had charged.

profiles.name: Disgustingly Resilient
profiles.description: Each time this model loses a wound, roll a D6; on a 5+, the model does not lose that wound.

profiles.description: Each time you roll a hit roll of 6+ for a model with this ability in the Fight phase, it can, if it was targeting an IMPERIUM unit, immediately make an extra attack against the same unit using the same weapon. These extra attacks cannot themselves generate any further attacks.

profiles.name: Plague sprayer
profiles.abilities: Plague Weapon. This weapon automatically hits its target. Roll to determine the Strength of this weapon after selecting a target but before determining how many shots are fired.

profiles.name: Flail of Corruption
profiles.abilities: Plague Weapon. Make D3 hit rolls each time you attack with this weapon, instead of only one. Excess damage from this weapon is not lost; instead keep allocating damage to another model in the unit until either all the damage has been allocated or the target is destroyed.
